games.summary: INDIANAPOLIS -- —Pascal Siakamsank a 14-foot jumper with a second left to give theIndiana Pacersa 103-101 victory over theChicago Bullson Saturday night. Siakam led the Pacers with 24 points and nine rebounds, whileBennedict Mathurinscored 19.Isaiah Jacksonhad 14 points and 11 rebounds off the bench.

games.summary: MIAMI -- —Cade Cunninghamscored 29 points,Duncan Robinsonhad 18 in his return to Miami and the Eastern Conference-leadingDetroit Pistonsheld off the Heat 138-135 on Saturday night to snap a two-game skid. It was the first time Robinson was back in Miami as an opponent; he was traded to Detroit this past summer.
